references.reason: This paper introduces the foundational concepts of GenEx, including world transitions, exploration, and applications in embodied AI.
This work provides the essential text-to-panorama model upon which GenEx's world initialization is built.
This paper introduces the state-of-the-art text-to-image model FLUX.1, which serves as the basis for the text-to-panorama model used in GenEx.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical Text-Conditional Image Generation with CLIP Latents
references.reason: DALL-E 2 is a crucial model referenced in the paper for text-to-image generation.

references.paper_title: High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Latent Diffusion Models
references.reason: Latent Diffusion Models are foundational to the image generation techniques used in GenEx and this paper helps inform its application.
